title: The.Thing.Divx3.1982
description:
From the old box.

Well, this can be taken literally: an old box with movies in the attic.
All are DivX or alike encoded. Most of them with the old DivX3 codec.
Didnt rip them myself and dont have the original release nfo.
The filename occasionally credits the group that did the rip.
